Job Security: After completion 2 years of training, when company was started during covid 19 period company requested to  all DET for joining again as a NEEM trainee.
Everyone was afraid of deadly virus but still some of us including me joined company as company's officers who called us given a commitment of atleast 1 year job cause they have our need  in pandemic situation.
We got joining and punching card with 6 month validity
But company's management informed via email that NEEM trainee will be removed and DET will be replaced them.
We request to management to extend just for 6 months from the date of our joining but they denied and put a 2 options in front of us.
Either do job until company keep you, dont rely on punching card expiry date
Or go to home, give resign
We decided about our future and given resign cause company could throw us anytime when their need is completed.
Cant believe in Management Policies that can be change anytime.

Company HR directly told before joining that there will be no further extension in job neither your excellent performance can give you confirmation in job. Never accept permanent job...
Job Security: After completion 2 years of training, when company was started during covid 19 period company requested to  all DET for joining again as a NEEM trainee.
Everyone was afraid of deadly virus but still some of us including me joined company as company's officers who called us given a commitment of atleast 1 year job cause they have our need  in pandemic situation.
We got joining and punching card with 6 month validity
But company's management informed via email that NEEM trainee will be removed and DET will be replaced them.
We request to management to extend just for 6 months from the date of our joining but they denied and put a 2 options in front of us.
Either do job until company keep you, dont rely on punching card expiry date
Or go to home, give resign
We decided about our future and given resign cause company could throw us anytime when their need is completed.
Cant believe in Management Policies that can be change anytime.
Officers are so unprofessional and use abusive language while in official meeting in front of all trainees also.
